Posts.Content: leelee101 wrote: I am 43 and suffer from depression and extreme anxiety. It gets so bad that I overlook health issues out of fear. I have noticed littls lumps in my right breast for some time definetly over a year...now I find I have other symptoms of breast cancer. Like lumps under the armpit and one breast feels heavier.. I had a cbc done 3 weeks ago that showed I had type 2 diabetes and high cholesteral..but nothing else was wrong. But I know this doesn't mean I'm cancer free.. I am terrified to find out cause I seen on the web if it is under your armpit it means it has spread...I have 3 kids who I raise alone and I can't stop crying.. I feel like I'm going to die from this... I hear so many stories of woMen dying and I'm afraid to the point I am sick to my stomach.. Also I have lost weight recently but doc said it was from having diabetes untreated.. I have a pretty lonely life so I have turnd to this site for some feedback... So afraid..I can't even explain how it is affecting me... I wake up all hours of the night sweating and crying.. Please help Thanks sooo much Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: so worried I have breast cancer leelee101 leelee101

Posts.Content: Apr 28, 2012 02:33PM leelee101 wrote: Its me again...I was up most of the night crying again...I can't imagine my kids with out me..I'm their ony parent...it was my birthday yesterday and my 15 year old bought me a book about what a wonderfuk mom I am..she wrote on each page how she feels about me and how she would never want to lose me...it broke my heart...and I'm so angry at myself for ignoring my health for so long..I really feel this outcome will be bad...just a feeling I have.. I can't do anything that takes my mind off it...I have been so depressed in my life that I didn't go for checkups...I could of had breast cancer for along time..and I know that's not good... I'm soo scared...I want to see my grandkids someday...I want to be there for my kids....please plese God help me
Posts.Title: so worried I have breast cancer leelee101 leelee101

I'm so scared that my not getting checkups might end my life...I'm so afraid...and there's nothing I can do about it...I can't go back in time...i feel like my nightmare is just beginning..sorry for whining so much...I just have never been so afraid in my life..

Posts.Title: so worried I have breast cancer leelee101 leelee101

Posts.Title: so worried I have breast cancer leelee101 leelee101

Posts.Content: leelee101 wrote: I am 43 and suffer from depression and extreme anxiety. It gets so bad that I overlook health issues out of fear. I have noticed littls lumps in my right breast for some time definetly over a year...now I find I have other symptoms of breast cancer. Like lumps under the armpit and one breast feels heavier.. I had a cbc done 3 weeks ago that showed I had type 2 diabetes and high cholesteral..but nothing else was wrong. But I know this doesn't mean I'm cancer free.. I am terrified to find out cause I seen on the web if it is under your armpit it means it has spread...I have 3 kids who I raise alone and I can't stop crying.. I feel like I'm going to die from this... I hear so many stories of woMen dying and I'm afraid to the point I am sick to my stomach.. Also I have lost weight recently but doc said it was from having diabetes untreated.. I have a pretty lonely life so I have turnd to this site for some feedback... So afraid..I can't even explain how it is affecting me... I wake up all hours of the night sweating and crying.. Please help Thanks sooo much Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: so worried I have breast cancer leelee101 leelee101

Thankyou all for saying you r proud of me..I have never in my life been around such a wonderful bunch of women..xo

Posts.Content: May 1, 2012 09:29PM leelee101 wrote: Hi VIckie..that is a great idea to have the little deordorant bottles available...I am very thankful for all the supprt here I get...it is amazing..I am woirried but trying to keep busy..went to see a movie with my daugher this evening...my mind would kinda drift away and I reeled it back into the movie..every now and than I will get this jolt of fear that almost takes my breath away..but I remind myself I don't even know what's going on yet...and I do this cause all you wonerful ladies gave me the strength...thanks sooo much
